member.name: M:MultipleParser.LumiSoft.Net.Mime.vCard.ItemCollection.SetDecodedValue(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Sets first item with specified value. If item doesn't exist, item will be appended to the end. If value is null, all items with specified name will be removed. Value is encoed as needed and specified item.ParametersString will be updated accordingly.
